DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to estimate the effect of fluconazole (200 mg BID for 2 days), a moderate CYP3A4 inhibitor on the pharmacokinetics of a single 8 mg oral dose of fesoterodine in healthy adult subjects.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Of Fluconazole On Pharmacokinetics Of Fesoterodine In Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy subjects between the ages of 18 and 55 years Not healthy subjects. subjects with acute or chronic medical or psychiatric condition or laboratory abnormality
DOC.keyword: The Effect Of Fluconazole On Pharmacokinetics Of Fesoterodine In Healthy Subjects
